snippet: Mitt Romney is getting the most support among Iowa caucus goers who say that defeating Mr. Obama was the most important quality in a candidate.
abstract: Mitt Romney is getting the most support among Iowa caucus goers who say that defeating Mr. Obama was the most important quality in a candidate.
lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney is getting the most support among Iowa caucus goers who say that defeating Mr. Obama was the most important quality in a candidate. Nearly half of voters who said defeating the president was the most important thing in a candidate said they were casting their support for Mr. Romney.
